fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Tackle: Roleblock a player and learn who they attempted to visit last night. (âˆž uses)
- Harden: Select a player non-Poke player, and roleblock all their visitors tonight. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Pokemembers are immune to being affected by your abilities or attributes.
- Regional Evolve: Upon roleblocking three people, you'll evolve into **Overqwil** (3075). You'll also evolve immediately if you ever roleblock someone who attempted to visit a fellow Pokemember.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: - Poison Point: If killed at night, poison your killer. They will be dealt a Powerful attack at the end of the next night unless healed.
